content.rendered:
Season's Greetings!

Assuming that the world doesn't end on Friday 21 December 2012, have yourself a very merry festive season and a happy start to 2013!

Best wishes

James

excerpt.rendered: Season’s Greetings! Assuming that the world doesn’t end on Friday 21 December 2012, have yourself a very merry festive season and a happy start to 2013! Best wishes James
